website_summaries.verdict: A slim, small design that's easy to use, making this model great for travelers.
pros: Thin, light, and portable at 5.6 x 0.55 x 5.3 inches
Includes two USB cables, one for power and one for data, for better transfer speeds
cons: Some found it on the noisy side

customer_reviews.title: We have a 2017 Macbook Pro that has no DVD ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2017 Macbook Pro that has no DVD drive and only USB type C connections so we have been using our Macbook Pro 2009 with a dvd drive or a PC I built to do everything dvd related. The drive in the Macbook pro 2009 died. It left us with just one computer with a dvd drive. Picked this external dvd drive up so that we can use it with any of the computers. It was just plug and go. Have been using for months now and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Josh AZ

customer_reviews.title: Requires two USB ports.
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly and accurately. Dislike using two USB ports, but suspect that's one reason it works so well. This fact should be prominently displayed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Operated for dozens of hours
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product less than a year ago, the unit shipped had been in inventory for nearly a year before I received it. Initially, it operated just fine. I connected this to a PC that was turned on less than 10 hours a month. Now it only makes a quiet clicking noise while Windows sees the device come and go over the USB connection. Completely inoperative. No warranty, no ability to return the unit to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awful. It was glitchy from the time I tried to use it and I have a brand new Mac computer. It held my CD’s hostage.. couldn’t read brand new CD’s.. spun and made a lot of noise. I’m returning and ordering something new. It’s also quite flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the item I received was defective and had to return it. It would not even spin the disc when inserted, and then it didn't want to open when I tried to push the button to open it. It took several attempts to rescue my disc. It was quite disappointing for a brand-new external disc drive from a mainstream brand people expect to work. I will not be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, great brand, doesn't seem to work with 2020 MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the drive to be recognized by my daughter's new 2020 MacBook Air running Catalina OS. I called ASUS help line, but not able to reach any tech support. ASUS online help was no help. I'm returning it and coughing up the extra $50 for an Apple Superdrive.
customer_reviews.author: KimC

customer_reviews.title: Good performance at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Dell external drive with this ASUS model. A little taken aback with the one cable using 2 USB ports. Luckily there was the 2nd cable with one c USB connection. Works great and cranking on ripping my cd collection to FLAC format. I guess my old drive struggled after 5 years of service. This one is working flawlessly. Only in use for 3 days at this time...
customer_reviews.author: James  Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Worst documentqtion of any product
customer_reviews.text: This product has the worst documentation I have ever seen. The instructions for set up are extremely limited and poor; the instructions for OS 10 are almost nonexistent, and those that are there are in error. Access to customer support are virtually impossible, since access is dependent upon numerous technical questions that have no answer! In short, if I could give -0's for this product, I would. This one is a definite return to Amazon. Those who would buy this anyway, beware! There are lots of other products as options...
customer_reviews.author: suzie q

I love ASUS computer laptops, and this is a fine addition for all DVD tasks at a low price too. Highly recommend!
